subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_007D_01C9D6E1.56AE77F0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I'm not saying it is you, but it is deep and gravelly like your voice.

Be =
careful of assigning any type of class to different voice types. Just becau=
se a voice might sound low and growly does not mean it is a lower life form=
. If we hear a spirit voice that sounds week and feint, we think the spirit=
 is in pain or trouble. But that isn't necessarily the case. It could be th=
at is all it could do at the moment due to any number of inhibiting factors=
.. Breaking the dimensional barrier is probably not easy.

Just like for us=
 living. You have a deep and resonant voice. That doesn't say much for your=
 class or personality, it is just the way your body was made. It wouldn't b=
e right for me to think you were of a lower or higher stature than me becau=
se of the sound of your voice.

Also, a voice may take on a different tone =
depending on how it is being transmitted.

People also like to make stateme=
nts about the color a spirit may appear in. Those assessment though are mad=
e in human ignorance. For instance, if a ghost appears black, out of the ba=
ggage we humans have attached to that color, we automatically assign and ev=
il label to it. But that isn't a proper assumption. It is our own inability=
 to remain objective. We see a color and we get an instant motor response. =
Those responses are human in nature and imposed upon us by other's beliefs =
or other environmental factors.

Bottom line is when it comes to this stuff=
, you cannot assess anything based on beliefs. "Just the facts maam..."

Yo=
u have to got by the spirits actions to tell what their demeanor is. Even t=
hen, a spirit's action can be misunderstood. Say a spirit has just thrown a=
n object in your direction. We may automatically think of that as an aggres=
sive attack. But the spirit is probably just trying to get your attention i=
n the most obvious way possible. It didn't throw the thing at you to hurt y=
ou.

See what I'm saying? The only way you can really tell a spirits demean=
or is by studying that same entity for a period of time to see what the nat=
ure of its actions are.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: James W. H=
yslope 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, May 17, 2009 10:49 A=
M
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC





  Shame on you=
 April :) (sounds like me) LOL. I'll give you a hint. I believe it says "le=
t's wait and bury him" This was from inside the house where I stay. There i=
s one EVP that DOES sound simular to my voice. It is the one "keep moving i=
t". I'm thinking (because is what I have read) that the growling type evp (=
as in keep moving it) are of the lower life form types. And the EVP was hav=
ing a difficult time speaking (seems like I can hear breathing too) Then re=
al words began to form. And to me it is very close to some of my voice trai=
ts. Maybe in "keep moving it" he was like a foreigner using the "accent" of=
 his teacher?? But this upload (that I didn't say what was said) has e "rob=
otic-mechanical" cadence.Well...it too was simular to the "keep moving it" =
as well. There sure was a lot of echo in my home recording. I have read rec=
ently that need to do checks (record in differnt locations) in the same roo=
m. Because furniture, walls, curtains and air currents can all affect your =
evp results or success. --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "April Abercrombie"=
 <april@...> wrote:
  >
  > I can't make out any words, but it sounds like =
alot like your voice.
  > 
  > ----- Original Message ----- 
  > From: EVP-=
ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  > To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  > Sent: Saturday, M=
ay 16, 2009 9:19 PM
  > Subject: [EVP-ITC] New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
  >=
 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > 
  > Hello,
  > 
  > This email message is a noti=
fication to let you know that
  > a file has been uploaded to the Files are=
a of the EVP-ITC 
  > group.
  > 
  > File : /Jim's RR-DR60 EVP's/3) Audaci=
ty-Goldwave-evp.mp3 
  > Uploaded by : clockdryve <clockdryve@...> 
  > Des=
cription : Here is another that is SUPER enhanced....I won't tell you what =
it says. See if you can figure out what it says. Everybody is having proble=
ms hearing my EVP's. I agree.....they are VERY difficult to hear. I am luck=
 with my headphones I guess. 
  > 
  > You can access this file at the URL:=

  > http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Jim%27s%20RR-DR60%20EVP%27=
s/3%29%20Audacity-Goldwave-evp.mp3 
  > 
  > To learn more about file shari=
ng for your group, please visit:
  > http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/group=
s/original/members/web/index.htmlfiles
  > 
  > Regards,
  > 
  > clockdryv=
e <clockdryve@...>
